hyp: The Special Olympics is truly changing the world. With 4.5 million athletes being reborn, they have a place to gain confidence, make friends, not be judged with prejudice, experience the feeling of being a champion, and actually become champions.

（拍手） スペシャルオリンピックスのおかげで 世界は変わりました でも まだ道のりは遠いです
rel_tgt: The Special Olympics teaches athletes to have confidence and pride.
(Applause) Thanks to the Special Olympics, the world has changed. But we still have a long way to go.
hist_info: "スペシャルオリンピックス" - "Special Olympics"

src: ありがとうございました
ref: Thank you very much.
hyp: Thank you very much.
rel_src: あなたが この次に 知的障害を持つ人を見かけたら その人の能力を 見てあげて欲しい
差別語を使う人を見かけたら どれだけひどい言葉なのか 教えてあげて欲しい
rel_tgt: When you next encounter someone with an intellectual disability, I hope you will see their abilities.
If you see someone using discriminatory language, I hope you will educate them on how hurtful those words can be.
